OOC:  Alrighty.  Cool.  Yay, Skulletron is capable of activating the Vok tr=
easures!
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: cardhead649 
  To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, August 18, 2002 8:20 PM
  Subject: Re: Gal=
vatron calls the groups back


  Empath::

  The black-and-yellow femme nod=
s and heads outside, changing to her 
  favored jet mode and taking off.  S=
he doesn't take a direct course 
  for her objective just yet, favoring an =
oblique approach.  (For those 
  of you who don't know such obscure words, =
"oblique" refers to a 
  moderately shallow arc.)

  OOC: For those who wen=
t into the "New Ideas" discussion topic on the 
  site, this is my Soul Orb=
 concept.  For those who never saw it, let's 
  just say these are Vok arti=
facts with great powers for those lucky 
  few capable of activating them: =
Meteara, Owlhawk, Empath, Rodimus 
  Prime, Skulletron, and Phoenix.  More =
names may be added to this 
  list, eventually.  They need to have a notabl=
e quirk, and not just in 
  bodily construction or personality.

  --- In n=
bwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
  > ::Cygnar::
  >        He glares at Gal=
vatron angrily but nods his acquiescence.  
  "Because 
  > you have comman=
ded it, it shall be done."  He performs the 
  Cybertronian 
  > equivalent=
 of clenching his jaw and looks to Empath.  "Shall we go 
  now?"
